mehi idikirim sandaha rupiyal miliyana 128ka mudalak rajaya wayakota thibe. 1971 sita me aayathanaya masika kuli padanama yatathe pawathwagena giya athara, me nawa godanangili sankirnaya wiwrutha kirimen thapal departhamenthuwata masakata wishala mudal pramanayak ithirikara ganimata hakiyawa labena bawa da ehidi sandahan wiya.
ow eeka aaruda namak.

umbaa aapu welawaka mata prasanna kiyala katha karanna ethakota hari mokada me intarnet inna aya witharane danne man deshakaya kiyala..

lankawe bihiwu nawa wamawadi deshapalana pakshaya wana janatha wimukthi peramune kriyakarithwaya samaga baddhawa ee sadaha jathyanthara sahayogaya labadimata meki pirisa dadi kapakirimakin katayuthu kala pirisak wiya. 88-89 pakshaya muhuna dun athishaya darunu mardanaya hamuwe paksha samajikayan aaraksha kirimata da owun jathyanthara sahaya labademin katayuthu karunu labiya.

mahakolambaa jala punaruththapana wyapruthiya yatathe aarambha karana lada maha parimanaye jala wyapruthi thunak aprel mada bhagaya wana wita siyalu wada awasan kota janatha ayithiyata pawara dimata jathika jalasampadana ha jalapawahana mandalaya piyawara gena thibe.kolambaa ha ee ha thadasanna pradesha gananawaka danata pawathina jala hingayata wisandumak lesa aarambha kara athi nawa jala wyapruthi wadasatahana yatathe ambaathale jala pawithragaraye sita gothatuwa nawa nagaraya dakwa kilomitar 43k wu jalaya beda harime nala paddhathiya wadi diyunu kerena athara jalaya randa thabima ha ema jalaya beda harima sandaha ghana mitar 1500ka jala sthambhayak da gothatuwe nawa nagaraye idiwemin pawathi.mita athirekawa kolambaa maligakande parani jalashayata anubaddhithawa ghana mitar 22000ka dharithawayakin yuthu nawa jala thatakayak ha kolambaa modara elihawus jalashaye pawathina parani bhugatha jalashaya wenuwata ghana mitar 38000ka dharithawayakin yuthu nawa jala thatakayak idikirima da wadasatahana ta ayath we.japan sahayogitha aayathanaye naya giwisuma yatathe labi athi mudalin me siyalu katayuthu kerena athara me wana wita me wyapruthiwala awasan adiyare katayuthu da nimawemin pawathina bawada me wyapruthi aarambha wimath samanga maha kolambaa jala punaruththapana bala pradeshaye adu aadayamlabhi pawul wala paribhogikayinta ginum gatha nowana nawa jala sambandhathawayak laba dimata da rajaye upades paridi jathika jala sampath mandalaya piyawara ganu athayi da ehi wyapruthi adhyakshakawarayek kiya..
